message_1: What is the smallest Mersenne prime number larger than 2?
message_2: The smallest Mersenne prime number larger than 2 is 7. Mersenne primes are prime numbers that can be written in the form 2^p - 1, where p is also a prime number. In this case, p = 3, so the Mersenne prime is 2^3 - 1 = 8 - 1 = 7.
